code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./Header.css';import logo from'../asset/logo.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){const[scrolled,setScrolled]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{setScrolled(window.scrollY>20);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);const scrollToSection=id=>{const el=document.getElementById(id);if(el){el.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"main-header".concat(scrolled?' scrolled':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-logo",onClick:()=>scrollToSection('banner'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"logo",className:"logo-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Ti\u1EC7m Tr\xE0 Nh\xE0 B\u01B0\u1EDFi"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"header-nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>scrollToSection('banner'),children:"Trang ch\u1EE7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>scrollToSection('about'),children:"Gi\u1EDBi thi\u1EC7u"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>scrollToSection('gallery'),children:"Menu"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>scrollToSection('contact'),children:"Li\xEAn h\u1EC7"})]})]});}export default Header;
